metadata.scenario: Customer support interaction about a billing issue

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm writing in because I was charged $75 this month, but my plan is supposed to be $50. I'm really frustrated because this keeps happening.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I understand your frustration. I can certainly look into that for you. Can you please provide your account number or the email address associated with your account?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's myemail@example.com. Also, can you explain *why* this keeps happening? I was told last time it was a 'one-time error,' but clearly it isn't.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. After reviewing your account, I see a recurring charge for a premium add-on that was inadvertently added during a previous promotion. I have removed the add-on and issued a refund for the $25 overcharge. You should see it reflected in your account within 3-5 business days. Regarding why this wasn't fixed previously, I do apologize. I've added a note to your account to prevent this from happening again. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
